name: PME Investimentos
overview: The Company was incorporated in 1989, in the form of limited company under the name SULPEDIP - Society for Industrial Development, SA, headquartered in London and in 1998 changed its name to PME Investimentos - Sociedade de Investimento SA. In September 2008, changed its headquarters to the port and is registered in the Commercial Registry of Oporto with the number 502218835. Its focus is the achievement of financial operations and provision of related services, primarily aimed at improving the financing conditions of non-financial sector entities in order to spur investment, development and corporate restructuring.
